Record.ClassificationPath: Respiratory Tract Diseases/Lung Diseases/Pulmonary Veno-Occlusive Disease
Record.Description: Pathological process resulting in the fibrous obstruction of the small- and medium-sized PULMONARY VEINS and PULMONARY HYPERTENSION. Veno-occlusion can arise from fibrous proliferation of the VASCULAR INTIMA and VASCULAR MEDIA; THROMBOSIS; or a combination of both.
